title: Why won't Riot sell level 30 accounts?
body:
Some of which can be ready for ranked, with set amounts of BE on each account, depending on how much you spend. 

Examples:

*  $20 gets you a level 30 account with 25-30k BE.
* $30 gets you a level 30 account with 40-50k BE.
* $40 gets you a level 30 account with 60-80k BE. 
etc.

Knowing how Riot is when it comes to money, I seriously don't understand why you wouldn't implement this. The whole "Well new players would just buy accounts and ruin ranked" got resolved because of how the new placement system works, so they'll just get placed in Iron 4 regardless. 

It would also address the smurfing problem in low level games, for it's legitimately filled with them, and are generally insanely toxic. 

To be honest, I don't see any reason not to.
